00058 #define VTX_SLIDE_SNAP_THRSH 15
00059 
00060 /* Cusom VertexSlide Operator data */
00061 typedef struct VertexSlideOp {
00062     /* Starting Vertex */
00063     BMVert *start_vtx;
00064     BMEdge *sel_edge;
00065 
00066     ViewContext *view_context;
00067     ARegion *active_region;
00068 
00069     /* Draw callback handle */
00070     void *draw_handle;
00071 
00072     /* Active Object */
00073     Object *obj;
00074 
00075     /* Are we in slide mode */
00076     int slide_mode;
00077     int snap_n_merge;
00078     int snap_to_end_vtx;
00079     int snap_to_mid;
00080 
00081     /* Snap threshold */
00082     float snap_threshold;
00083 
00084     float distance;
00085     float interp[3];
00086 
00087     /* Edge Frame Count */
00088     int disk_edges;
00089 
00090     /* Edges */
00091     BMEdge** edge_frame;
00092 
00093     /* Slide Frame Endpoints */
00094     float (*vtx_frame)[3];
00095 
00096     /* Mouse Click 2d pos */
00097     int m_co[2];
00098 
00099 } VertexSlideOp;
00100 
00101 static void vtx_slide_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *arg);
00102 static int edbm_vertex_slide_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op);
00103 static void vtx_slide_exit(const bContext *C, wmOperator *op);
00104 static int vtx_slide_set_frame(VertexSlideOp *vso);

00106 static int vtx_slide_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00107 {
00108     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00109     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00110     BMEditSelection *ese;
00111 
00112     /* Custom data */
00113     VertexSlideOp *vso;
00114 
00115     const char *header_str = "Vertex Slide: Hover over an edge and left-click to select slide edge. "
00116                              "Left-Shift: Midpoint Snap, Left-Alt: Snap, Left-Ctrl: Snap&Merge";
00117 
00118     if (!obedit) {
00119         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Vertex Slide Error: Not object in context");
00120         return FALSE;
00121     }
00122 
00123     EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
00124     ese = em->bm->selected.last;
00125 
00126     /* Is there a starting vertex  ? */
00127     if (ese == NULL || (ese->htype != BM_VERT && ese->htype != BM_EDGE)) {
00128         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR_INVALID_INPUT, "Vertex Slide Error: Select a (single) vertex");
00129         return FALSE;
00130     }
00131 
00132     vso = MEM_callocN(sizeof(VertexSlideOp), "Vertex Slide Operator");
00133     vso->view_context = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ViewContext), "Vertex Slide View Context");
00134 
00135     op->customdata = vso;
00136 
00137     /* Set the start vertex */
00138     vso->start_vtx = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
00139 
00140     vso->sel_edge = NULL;
00141 
00142     /* Edges */
00143     vso->edge_frame = NULL;
00144 
00145     vso->vtx_frame = NULL;
00146 
00147     vso->disk_edges = 0;
00148 
00149     vso->slide_mode = FALSE;
00150 
00151     vso->snap_n_merge = FALSE;
00152 
00153     vso->snap_to_end_vtx = FALSE;
00154 
00155     vso->snap_to_mid = FALSE;
00156 
00157     vso->distance = 0.0f;
00158 
00159     vso->snap_threshold = 0.2f;
00160 
00161     /* Notify the viewport */
00162     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
00163 
00164     /* Set the drawing region */
00165     vso->active_region = CTX_wm_region(C);
00166 
00167     /* Set the draw callback */
00168     vso->draw_handle = ED_region_draw_cb_activate(vso->active_region->type, vtx_slide_draw, vso, REGION_DRAW_POST_VIEW);
00169 
00170     ED_area_headerprint(CTX_wm_area(C), header_str);
00171     
00172     em_setup_viewcontext(C, vso->view_context);
00173 
00174     /* Set the object */
00175     vso->obj = obedit;
00176 
00177     /* Init frame */
00178     if (!vtx_slide_set_frame(vso)) {
00179         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR_INVALID_INPUT, "Vertex Slide: Can't find starting vertex!");
00180         vtx_slide_exit(C, op);
00181         return FALSE;
00182     }
00183 
00184     /* Add handler for the vertex sliding */
00185     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00186 
00187     /* Tag for redraw */
00188     ED_region_tag_redraw(vso->active_region);
00189 
00190     return TRUE;
00191 }
00192 
00193 static void vtx_slide_confirm(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00194 {
00195     VertexSlideOp *vso = op->customdata;
00196     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(vso->obj);
00197     BMesh* bm = em->bm;
00198 
00199     /* Select new edge */
00200     BM_edge_select_set(bm, vso->sel_edge, TRUE);
00201 
00202     /* Invoke operator */
00203     edbm_vertex_slide_exec(C, op);
00204 
00205     if (vso->snap_n_merge) {
00206         float other_d;
00207         BMVert* other = BM_edge_other_vert(vso->sel_edge, vso->start_vtx);
00208         other_d = len_v3v3(vso->interp, other->co);
00209 
00210         /* Only snap if within threshold */
00211         if (other_d < vso->snap_threshold) {
00212             BM_vert_select_set(bm, other, TRUE);
00213             BM_vert_select_set(bm, vso->start_vtx, TRUE);
00214             EDBM_op_callf(em, op, "pointmerge verts=%hv mergeco=%v", BM_ELEM_SELECT, other->co);
00215             EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00216         }
00217         else {
00218             /* Store in historty if not merging */
00219             BM_select_history_store(em->bm, vso->start_vtx);
00220         }
00221     }
00222     else {
00223         /* Store edit selection of the active vertex, allows other
00224          *  ops to run without reselecting */
00225         BM_select_history_store(em->bm, vso->start_vtx);
00226     }
00227 
00228     EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
00229     
00230     /* NC_GEOM | ND_DATA & Retess */
00231     EDBM_update_generic(C, em, TRUE);
00232     
00233     ED_region_tag_redraw(vso->active_region);
00234 }
00235 
00236 static void vtx_slide_exit(const bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00237 {
00238     /* Fetch custom data */
00239     VertexSlideOp *vso = op->customdata;
00240 
00241     /* Clean-up the custom data */
00242     ED_region_draw_cb_exit(vso->active_region->type, vso->draw_handle);
00243 
00244     /* Free Custom Data
00245      *
00246      */
00247     MEM_freeN(vso->view_context);
00248 
00249     vso->view_context = NULL;
00250 
00251     if (vso->edge_frame) {
00252         MEM_freeN(vso->edge_frame);
00253     }
00254 
00255     if (vso->vtx_frame) {
00256         MEM_freeN(vso->vtx_frame);
00257     }
00258 
00259     vso->edge_frame = NULL;
00260 
00261     vso->vtx_frame = NULL;
00262 
00263     vso->slide_mode = FALSE;
00264 
00265     MEM_freeN(vso);
00266     vso = NULL;
00267     op->customdata = NULL;
00268 
00269     /* Clear the header */
00270     ED_area_headerprint(CTX_wm_area(C), NULL);
00271 }
00272 
00273 static void vtx_slide_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *UNUSED(ar), void *arg)
00274 {
00275     VertexSlideOp *vso = arg;
00276 
00277     /* Have an edge to draw */
00278     if (vso && vso->sel_edge) {
00279         /* Get 3d view */
00280         View3D *view3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00281         const float outline_w = UI_GetThemeValuef(TH_OUTLINE_WIDTH) + 0.8f;
00282         const float pt_size = UI_GetThemeValuef(TH_FACEDOT_SIZE) + 1.5;
00283 
00284         int i = 0;
00285 
00286         if (view3d && view3d->zbuf)
00287             glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00288 
00289         glPushAttrib(GL_CURRENT_BIT | GL_LINE_BIT | GL_POINT_BIT);
00290 
00291         glPushMatrix();
00292         glMultMatrixf(vso->obj->obmat);
00293 
00294         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00295         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00296             
00297 
00298         if (vso->slide_mode && vso->disk_edges > 0) {
00299             /* Draw intermediate edge frame */
00300             UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_EDGE_SELECT, 50, -50);
00301 
00302             for (i = 0; i < vso->disk_edges; i++) {
00303                 glBegin(GL_LINES);
00304                 glVertex3fv(vso->vtx_frame[i]);
00305                 glVertex3fv(vso->interp);
00306                 glEnd();
00307             }
00308         }
00309 
00310         /* Draw selected edge
00311          * Add color offset and reduce alpha */
00312         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_EDGE_SELECT, 40, -50);
00313 
00314         glLineWidth(outline_w);
00315 
00316         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00317         bglVertex3fv(vso->sel_edge->v1->co);
00318         bglVertex3fv(vso->sel_edge->v2->co);
00319         glEnd();
00320 
00321         if (vso->slide_mode) {
00322             /* Draw interpolated vertex */
00323             
00324             UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_FACE_DOT, -80, -50);
00325 
00326             glPointSize(pt_size);
00327 
00328             bglBegin(GL_POINTS);
00329             bglVertex3fv(vso->interp);
00330             bglEnd();
00331         }
00332 
00333         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00334         glPopMatrix();
00335         glPopAttrib();
00336 
00337         if (view3d && view3d->zbuf)
00338             glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00339     }
00340 }
00341 
00342 static BMEdge* vtx_slide_nrst_in_frame(VertexSlideOp *vso, const float mval[2])
00343 {
00344     BMEdge* cl_edge = NULL;
00345     if (vso->disk_edges > 0) {
00346         int i = 0;
00347         BMEdge* edge = NULL;
00348         
00349         float v1_proj[3], v2_proj[3];
00350         float dist = 0;
00351         float min_dist = FLT_MAX;
00352 
00353         for (i = 0; i < vso->disk_edges; i++) {
00354             edge = vso->edge_frame[i];
00355 
00356             mul_v3_m4v3(v1_proj, vso->obj->obmat, edge->v1->co);
00357             project_float_noclip(vso->active_region, v1_proj, v1_proj);
00358 
00359             mul_v3_m4v3(v2_proj, vso->obj->obmat, edge->v2->co);
00360             project_float_noclip(vso->active_region, v2_proj, v2_proj);
00361 
00362             dist = dist_to_line_segment_v2(mval, v1_proj, v2_proj);
00363             if (dist < min_dist) {
00364                 min_dist = dist;
00365                 cl_edge = edge;
00366             }
00367         }
00368     }
00369     return cl_edge;
00370 }
00371 
00372 static void vtx_slide_find_edge(VertexSlideOp *vso, wmEvent *event)
00373 {
00374     /* Nearest edge */
00375     BMEdge *nst_edge = NULL;
00376 
00377     const float mval_float[] = { (float)event->mval[0], (float)event->mval[1]};
00378 
00379     /* Set mouse coords */
00380     copy_v2_v2_int(vso->view_context->mval, event->mval);
00381 
00382     /* Find nearest edge */
00383     nst_edge = vtx_slide_nrst_in_frame(vso, mval_float);
00384 
00385     if (nst_edge) {
00386         /* Find a connected edge */
00387         if (BM_vert_in_edge(nst_edge, vso->start_vtx)) {
00388 
00389             /* Save mouse coords */
00390             copy_v2_v2_int(vso->m_co, event->mval);
00391 
00392             /* Set edge */
00393             vso->sel_edge = nst_edge;
00394         }
00395     }
00396 }
00397 
00398 /* Updates the status of the operator - Invoked on mouse movement */
00399 static void vtx_slide_update(VertexSlideOp *vso, wmEvent *event)
00400 {
00401     BMEdge *edge;
00402 
00403     /* Find nearest edge */
00404     edge = vso->sel_edge;
00405 
00406     if (edge) {
00407         float edge_other_proj[3];
00408         float start_vtx_proj[3];
00409         float edge_len;
00410         BMVert *other;
00411 
00412         float interp[3];
00413 
00414         /* Calculate interpolation value for preview */
00415         float t_val;
00416 
00417         float mval_float[] = { (float)event->mval[0], (float)event->mval[1]};
00418         float closest_2d[2];
00419 
00420         other = BM_edge_other_vert(edge, vso->start_vtx);
00421 
00422         /* Project points onto screen and do interpolation in 2D */
00423         mul_v3_m4v3(start_vtx_proj, vso->obj->obmat, vso->start_vtx->co);
00424         project_float_noclip(vso->active_region, start_vtx_proj, start_vtx_proj);
00425 
00426         mul_v3_m4v3(edge_other_proj, vso->obj->obmat, other->co);
00427         project_float_noclip(vso->active_region, edge_other_proj, edge_other_proj);
00428 
00429         closest_to_line_v2(closest_2d, mval_float, start_vtx_proj, edge_other_proj);
00430 
00431         t_val = line_point_factor_v2(closest_2d, start_vtx_proj, edge_other_proj);
00432 
00433         /* Set snap threshold to be proportional to edge length */
00434         edge_len = len_v3v3(start_vtx_proj, edge_other_proj);
00435         
00436         if (edge_len <= 0.0f)
00437             edge_len = VTX_SLIDE_SNAP_THRSH;
00438 
00439         edge_len =  (len_v3v3(edge->v1->co, edge->v2->co) * VTX_SLIDE_SNAP_THRSH) / edge_len;
00440 
00441         vso->snap_threshold =  edge_len;
00442 
00443         /* Snap to mid */
00444         if (vso->snap_to_mid) {
00445             t_val = 0.5f;
00446         }
00447 
00448         /* Interpolate preview vertex 3D */
00449         interp_v3_v3v3(interp, vso->start_vtx->co, other->co, t_val);
00450         copy_v3_v3(vso->interp, interp);
00451 
00452         vso->distance = t_val;
00453 
00454         /* If snapping */
00455         if (vso->snap_to_end_vtx) {
00456             int start_at_v1 = edge->v1 == vso->start_vtx;
00457             float v1_d = len_v3v3(vso->interp, edge->v1->co);
00458             float v2_d = len_v3v3(vso->interp, edge->v2->co);
00459 
00460             if (v1_d > v2_d && v2_d < vso->snap_threshold) {
00461                 copy_v3_v3(vso->interp, edge->v2->co);
00462 
00463                 if (start_at_v1)
00464                     vso->distance = 1.0f;
00465                 else
00466                     vso->distance = 0.0f;
00467             }
00468             if (v2_d > v1_d && v1_d < vso->snap_threshold) {
00469                 copy_v3_v3(vso->interp, edge->v1->co);
00470                 if (start_at_v1)
00471                     vso->distance = 0.0f;
00472                 else
00473                     vso->distance = 1.0f;
00474             }
00475         }
00476     }
00477 }
00478 
00479 /* Sets the outline frame */
00480 static int vtx_slide_set_frame(VertexSlideOp *vso)
00481 {
00482     BMEdge *edge;
00483     float (*vtx_frame)[3] = NULL;
00484     BMEdge** edge_frame = NULL;
00485     BMVert *curr_vert = NULL;
00486     BLI_array_declare(vtx_frame);
00487     BLI_array_declare(edge_frame);
00488     BMIter iter;
00489     BMVert *sel_vtx = vso->start_vtx;
00490     int idx = 0;
00491 
00492     vso->disk_edges = 0;
00493 
00494     if (vso->edge_frame) {
00495         MEM_freeN(vso->edge_frame);
00496         vso->edge_frame = NULL;
00497     }
00498 
00499     if (vso->vtx_frame) {
00500         MEM_freeN(vso->vtx_frame);
00501         vso->vtx_frame = NULL;
00502     }
00503 
00504     /* Iterate over edges of vertex and copy them */
00505     BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (edge, &iter, sel_vtx, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT, idx) {
00506         curr_vert = BM_edge_other_vert(edge, sel_vtx);
00507         if (curr_vert) {
00508             BLI_array_growone(vtx_frame);
00509 
00510             copy_v3_v3(vtx_frame[idx], curr_vert->co);
00511 
00512             BLI_array_append(edge_frame, edge);
00513             vso->disk_edges++;
00514         }
00515     }
00516 
00517     vso->edge_frame = edge_frame;
00518     vso->vtx_frame = vtx_frame;
00519 
00520     /* Set the interp at starting vtx */
00521     copy_v3_v3(vso->interp, sel_vtx->co);
00522 
00523     return vso->disk_edges > 0;
00524 }
00525 
00526 static int edbm_vertex_slide_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00527 {
00528     VertexSlideOp *vso = op->customdata;
00529     char buff[128];
00530 
00531     if (!vso)
00532         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00533 
00534     /* Notify the viewport */
00535     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
00536 
00537     switch (event->type) {
00538         case LEFTSHIFTKEY:
00539         {
00540             switch (event->val) {
00541                 case KM_PRESS:
00542                     vso->snap_to_mid = TRUE;
00543                     break;
00544                 case KM_RELEASE:
00545                     vso->snap_to_mid = FALSE;
00546                     break;
00547             }
00548 
00549             break;
00550         }
00551         case LEFTCTRLKEY:
00552         {
00553             switch (event->val) {
00554                 case KM_PRESS:
00555                     vso->snap_n_merge = TRUE;
00556                     vso->snap_to_end_vtx = TRUE;
00557                     break;
00558                 case KM_RELEASE:
00559                     vso->snap_n_merge = FALSE;
00560                     vso->snap_to_end_vtx = FALSE;
00561                     break;
00562             }
00563 
00564             break;
00565         }
00566         case LEFTALTKEY:
00567         {
00568             switch (event->val) {
00569                 case KM_PRESS:
00570                     vso->snap_to_end_vtx = TRUE;
00571                     break;
00572                 case KM_RELEASE:
00573                     vso->snap_to_end_vtx = FALSE;
00574                     break;
00575             }
00576 
00577             break;
00578         }
00579         case RIGHTMOUSE:
00580         {
00581             /* Enforce redraw */
00582             ED_region_tag_redraw(vso->active_region);
00583 
00584             /* Clean-up */
00585             vtx_slide_exit(C, op);
00586 
00587             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00588         }
00589         case LEFTMOUSE:
00590         {
00591             if (event->val == KM_PRESS) {
00592                 /* Update mouse coords */
00593                 copy_v2_v2_int(vso->m_co, event->mval);
00594 
00595                 if (vso->slide_mode) {
00596                     vtx_slide_confirm(C, op);
00597                     /* Clean-up */
00598                     vtx_slide_exit(C, op);
00599                     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00600                 }
00601                 else if (vso->sel_edge) {
00602                     vso->slide_mode = TRUE;
00603                 }
00604             }
00605 
00606             ED_region_tag_redraw(vso->active_region);
00607             break;
00608 
00609         }
00610         case MOUSEMOVE:
00611         {
00612             sprintf(buff, "Vertex Slide: %f", vso->distance);
00613             if (!vso->slide_mode) {
00614                 vtx_slide_find_edge(vso, event);
00615             }
00616             else {
00617                 vtx_slide_update(vso, event);
00618             }
00619             ED_area_headerprint(CTX_wm_area(C), buff);
00620             ED_region_tag_redraw(vso->active_region);
00621             break;
00622         }
00623     }
00624 
00625     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00626 }
00627 
00628 static int edbm_vertex_slide_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00629 {
00630     /* Exit the modal */
00631     vtx_slide_exit(C, op);
00632 
00633     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00634 }
00635 
00636 static int edbm_vertex_slide_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00637 {
00638     /* Initialize the operator */
00639     if (vtx_slide_init(C, op))
00640         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00641     else
00642         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00643 }
00644 
00645 /* Vertex Slide */
00646 static int edbm_vertex_slide_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00647 {
00648     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00649     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00650     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00651     BMVert *start_vert;
00652     BMOperator bmop;
00653     BMEditSelection *ese = (BMEditSelection *)em->bm->selected.last;
00654 
00655     float distance_t = 0.0f;
00656 
00657     /* Invoked modally? */
00658     if (op->type->modal == edbm_vertex_slide_modal && op->customdata) {
00659         VertexSlideOp *vso = (VertexSlideOp *)op->customdata;
00660 
00661         if (bm->totedgesel > 1) {
00662             /* Reset selections */
00663             EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00664             BM_edge_select_set(bm, vso->sel_edge, TRUE);
00665             BM_vert_select_set(bm, vso->start_vtx, TRUE);
00666 
00667             BM_select_history_store(em->bm, vso->sel_edge);
00668             BM_select_history_store(em->bm, vso->start_vtx);
00669             ese = (BMEditSelection *)em->bm->selected.last;
00670         }
00671         distance_t = vso->distance;
00672         RNA_float_set(op->ptr, "distance_t", distance_t);
00673     }
00674     else {
00675         /* Get Properties */
00676         distance_t = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "distance_t");
00677     }
00678 
00679     /* Is there a starting vertex  ? */
00680     if ((ese == NULL) || (ese->htype != BM_VERT && ese->htype != BM_EDGE)) {
00681         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR_INVALID_INPUT, "Vertex Slide Error: Select a (single) vertex");
00682         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00683     }
00684 
00685     start_vert = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
00686 
00687     /* Prepare operator */
00688     if (!EDBM_op_init(em, &bmop, op,
00689                       "vertex_slide vert=%e edge=%hev distance_t=%f",
00690                       start_vert, BM_ELEM_SELECT, distance_t))
00691     {
00692         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00693     }
00694     /* Execute operator */
00695     BMO_op_exec(bm, &bmop);
00696 
00697     /* Deselect the input edges */
00698     BMO_slot_buffer_hflag_disable(bm, &bmop, "edge", BM_ALL, BM_ELEM_SELECT, TRUE);
00699 
00700     /* Select the output vert */
00701     BMO_slot_buffer_hflag_enable(bm, &bmop, "vertout", BM_ALL, BM_ELEM_SELECT, TRUE);
00702 
00703     /* Flush the select buffers */
00704     EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
00705 
00706     if (!EDBM_op_finish(em, &bmop, op, TRUE)) {
00707         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00708     }
00709 
00710     /* Update Geometry */
00711     EDBM_update_generic(C, em, TRUE);
00712 
00713     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00714 }
00715 
00716 void MESH_OT_vert_slide(wmOperatorType *ot)
00717 {
00718     PropertyRNA *prop;
00719 
00720     /* identifiers */
00721     ot->name = "Vertex Slide";
00722     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_vert_slide";
00723     ot->description = "Vertex slide";
00724 
00725     /* api callback */
00726     ot->invoke = edbm_vertex_slide_invoke;
00727     ot->modal = edbm_vertex_slide_modal;
00728     ot->cancel = edbm_vertex_slide_cancel;
00729     ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh_region_view3d;
00730 
00731     /* ot->exec = edbm_vertex_slide_exec;
00732      * ot->poll = ED_operator_editmesh; */
00733 
00734     /* flags */
00735     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00736 
00737     /* Properties for vertex slide */
00738     prop = RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "distance_t", 0.0f, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Distance", "Distance", -5.0f, 5.0f);
00739     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -5.0f, 5.0f, 0.1, 4);
00740     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00741 }
